explanation: [0-0] A room with white walls and a ceiling lamp. On the white floor, there is a blue and pink mat. There are two tables in the room. On one table, there is a box with a red lid and a pink body. Beside the table are a chair and a baby seat. On the other table, there are five boxes of chocolate on the right side of the screen and a white plate with something on it on the left side. A man is sitting by the table with the chocolate. The man is wearing a purple wig and headband, holding a glove filled with blue liquid in his left hand and a red pencil in his right hand.

[0-2] The man in the wig stabs the glove filled with liquid with the pencil in his right hand. The pencil punctures the glove, the liquid pours out of the hole, and the man laughs and trembles. Immediately afterwards, a hand holding a plate appears from the left side of the screen and presses it onto the face of the man wearing the wig. After the plate is removed, foam appears on the man's face. White subtitles appear on the left side of the screen: "White shaving foam. Identify carefully."
